snippet: Watching John Edwards watch himself lie, when a 2008 television interview was played in the courtroom, was the most electric moment yet in his dramatic three-week trial.
abstract: Prosecutors rest their case against former Sen John Edwards after presenting a video of a 2008 interview in which Edwards denied a number of facts about his extramarital affair.
lead_paragraph: Watching John Edwards watch himself lie, when a 2008 television interview was played in the courtroom, was the most electric moment yet in his dramatic three-week trial.

headline.seo: Prosecution Rests After Presenting Video of John Edwards’s Lies About Affair
headline.main: Prosecution Rests After Presenting Video of Edwards’s Lies About His Affair
